title: What is this "defeat the elder dragon" mission ?
body: Like what the fuck, I can count on fingers of my one hand how many times I killed the elder dragon since it was introduced. 90% of the games don't last that long. And they make the mission for 400 blue essence, like it's the easiest mission ever.

replies.body: I suspect that most completions of this mission will involve five like-minded players queuing up together for co-op vs AI.
Make sure you are aware of the difference between elemental and elder

I believe the "defeat the elder dragon" missions is a mission where you have to beat the elder dragon.
Its a free 400 BE so idc how tricky it is to get, ill take any free things riot throws our way.
They updated the mission and now you have 2 options 1. "As a team defeat an elder drake" 2. "Play 2 games of SR ARAM or ARURF"
anyone wanna form a group inv me {{champion:17}}
